des: "I wanted to copycat the Starbucks RefreshersÂ® canned spritzers. This makes 12 ounces and uses green tea instead of green coffee extract. It's close. Adjust the juice to your taste. Store extra green tea concentrate in the fridge."
ins:
Steep tea bags in boiling water for 2 minutes. Remove and discard tea bags. Set tea concentrate aside to cool.
Fill a tall glass with ice cubes. Pour club soda, juice cocktail, and 3 ounces of the tea concentrate over the ice cubes; stir.
